mapper.insert: insert into book_list(isbn, title, author, publisher, pdate, image, price, description) values(#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},#{param5},#{param6},#{param7},#{param8})
mapper.select: select count(*) from book_list where isbn=#{param1}
select * from book_list order by isbn desc
mapper.update: update book_list set title=#{param1}, author=#{param2}, publisher=#{param3}, pdate=#{param4}, image=#{param5}, price=#{param6}, description=#{param7} where isbn=#{param8}
